aiChat.title: AI Assistant

aiChat.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?

aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: I am here to help you with your social media campaigns. You can ask me about creating new campaigns, improving existing ones, or analyzing your content performance.
aiAssistant.error: I apologize, but I encountered an error processing your request. Please try again later.
aiAssistant.subtitle: Ask your AI assistant anything.
